mapper.insert: replace into sys_comment( replyId, wznm, commentContent, commentType, praiseNum, submitPerson, auditPerson, auditStatus, auditTime, auditReason, submitTime )values ( #{replyId}, #{wznm}, #{commentContent}, #{commentType}, #{praiseNum}, #{submitPerson}, #{auditPerson}, #{auditStatus}, #{auditTime}, #{auditReason}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) from sys_comment comment left join m_user user on comment.submitPerson = user.yhnm left join m_user_icon icon on icon.yhnm = user.yhnm where 1 = 1 and wznm = #{wznm} and comment.commentType = #{commentType} and comment.valid = '1' and comment.replyId is null and icon.isActivity = '1'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ( @i := @i + 1 ) rk, comment.commentId as id, icon.iconUrl, user.nickname as commitName, comment.commentContent as content, comment.praiseNum, (case when great.status = '1' then true else false end) as isGiveLike, DATE_FORMAT(comment.submitTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as time from sys_comment comment left join m_user user on comment.submitPerson = user.yhnm left join m_user_icon icon on icon.yhnm = user.yhnm left join (select * from sys_great_record where yhnm = #{yhnm}) great on great.typeId = comment.commentId, ( SELECT @i := 0 ) rk where 1 = 1 and wznm = #{wznm} and comment.commentType = #{commentType} and comment.valid = '1' and comment.replyId is null and icon.isActivity = '1' order by submitTime desc ) AS comment
where rk between (#{page}-1)*#{limit} + 1 and #{page}*#{limit}

select comment.commentId as id, icon.iconUrl, user.nickname as commitName, comment.commentContent as content, comment.praiseNum, (case when great.status = '1' then true else false end) as isGiveLike, DATE_FORMAT(comment.submitTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as time from sys_comment comment left join m_user user on comment.submitPerson = user.yhnm left join m_user_icon icon on icon.yhnm = user.yhnm left join (select * from sys_great_record where yhnm = #{yhnm}) great on great.typeId = comment.commentId where replyId = #{replyId} and wznm = #{wznm} and comment.commentType = #{commentType} and comment.valid = '1' and icon.isActivity = '1' order by id asc
mapper.insert: replace into sys_great_record ( typeId, type, yhnm, status, greatTime ) values ( #{typeId}, #{type}, #{yhnm}, #{status}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: update sys_great_record set typeId = #{typeId}, type = #{type}, yhnm = #{yhnm}, status = #{status}, greatTime = sysdate() where typeId = #{typeId} and yhnm = #{yhnm} and type = #{type}
mapper.select: select count(1) from sys_great_record where typeid = #{typeId} and type = #{type} and yhnm = #{yhnm}
select sum(praiseNum) from sys_comment where commentId = #{commentId}
mapper.update: update sys_comment set praiseNum = #{praiseNum} where commentId = #{commentId}
